name: [DEADCHEM012] Iron Witch/The Atrocity Exhibit - Split 7"
description: Iron Witch - Her Cheating Heart 6:42 The Atrocity Exhibit - Throne Of Bile 6:02 Iron Witch, the reigning kings of UK sludge, team up with the magnificently bearded grindcore/sludge berserkers The Atrocity Exhibit for this 7" split of pure audio carnage. 1 track each, both 6 minutes long, both designed to make your brain leak out through your nostrils such is the sheer force of the music contained within these grooves. The Atrocity Exhibit swerve the use of blistering speed sometimes shown in their past work and instead spit out the snail-paced 'Throne Of Bile', a masterclass in tension-filled suffering; a track rippling with a violent, unpredictable swagger that's constantly threatening to explode in your face. Iron Witch offer no respite, with 'Her Cheating Heart' being perhaps their best song yet; a track of such colossal heaviness and down-tuned, down-beat, forceful depression that's it's like having your face forced down into the muck that lines the banks of the Mersey. With both bands on such rampantly aggressive form, this is without a doubt the ugliest 7" to crawl its way out of the UK this year. Iron Witch track was recorded by Bri and Devo Doom at the 1in12 Studio, Bradford, in September 2013 The Atrocity Exhibit track was recorded, mixed and mastered by Ian Boult at Stuck On A Name Studios, Nottingham, in July 2012 A joint release between Dead Chemists and Witch Hunter Records, this split 7" is limited to 500 copies, on none more black vinyl, and comes with a 4 panel gatefold sleeve, with artwork & layout by James Caygill www.facebook.com/deadchemistsrecords deadchemists@gmail.com www.facebook.com/WitchHunterRecords witchhunterrecords@gmail.com www.facebook.com/ironwitch1977 iron.witch@hotmail.com www.facebook.com/theatrocityexhibit atrocityexhibitgrind@gmail.com ** THIS IS A PRE-ORDER AND WILL SHIP AS SOON AS WE GET THE RECORDS BACK FROM THE PRESSING PLANT, WHICH SHOULD HOPEFULLY BE IN A FEW WEEKS. YOUR PATIENCE IS APPRECIATED **

name: [DEADCHEM009] Art Of Burning Water - The Humiliation Process 7"
description: "Noise was made and dance halls emptied. Tears were shed and sorrow was aplenty. Laughter filled the vans and the smoke filled our lungs. With tinnitus to unite us, only we can make failure fun. Beats and noise strength in the face of some grim and harsh times. Intestinal fortitude tenfold. We'd make Mr. Balboa proud." The latest noise from noisy London bastards Art Of Burning water. Just as filthy as their previous LPs but faster and with more grind/powerviolence tendencies.

name: [DEADCHEM011] The Atrocity Exhibit/Catheter - Split 7"
description: UK grind VS. US Doomviolence. Anyone familiar with UK grindcore will already know The Atrocity Exhibit (from previous releases on Grindcore Karaoke, as well as shows all over the place) and what to expect from them... Relentless fucking grind. On the other side is Catheter, who you should know from splits with the likes of Birdflesh, Massgrave etc.. and their ridiculous LP from last year. Massive, sludge-y grind! One new track and one cover from each band. If you have any interest in fast music, you probably need this!

name: [DEADCHEM010] Discomfort - Scorn 10"
description: Punk/metal/crust crossover madness FFO: Heavy music? A few bits sound slightly like recent Converge (without sounding like a shitty ripoff) maybe. Just listen to it. 'Dirt' is my favourite track of the year and should be yours too. Black vinyl/250 copies. Co-release with- Buried But Breathing (US) Aim Down Sight Records (EU) Eastrain Recs (EU) Listen/download for free -

name: [DEADCHEM008] F.Emasculata - The Truth 7"
description: Punk. X-Files. What more do you even need to know? 7" vinyl pressing of debut EP 'The Truth'. Released by Atomsmasher Records/Smeg! Recs/Made in the Meth Lab Recs/ Anarchotic Recs/ Dead Chemist Recs. Limited pressing. Pressed on black. 1. F.Emasculata 01:34 2. Samantha 01:27 3. The Pinck Parcel 01:19 4. Copy Song 01:20 5. Season 9 00:32 6. Nobody 01:41 7. Z-15 01:14 8. Shane 01:29 9. The X Files 01:29

name: [DEADCHEM007] Corrupt Moral Altar - Whiskey Sierra 7"
description: SHIPPING NOW! "Mix grind and sludge, soak it in whiskey and bile and you'll be getting somewhere near Liverpool's Corrupt Moral Altar. Sounding part Iron Monkey, part Mistress and part pounding hangover, it's disgusting in the best possible way. They follow up last years 'Needle Drugs' demo and the Baitin' The Trap EP, 'Luciferian Deathcult' with the new 7 inch 'Whiskey Sierra.' 2 new tracks, 2 remastered tracks from the demo and it quickly picks up where the last EP finished. Huge riffs and grooves, blasting drums and tortured shrieks, it's the perfect soundtrack to drinking yourself through misery, right into unconsciousness. " Limited to 300 copies on white vinyl. Records come with a CMA poster and a download code. www.facebook.com/corruptmoralaltar www.twitter.com/corruptmoralalt

name: [DEADCHEM006] XKateXMoshX/Fatal Nunchaku
description:
Continental fastcore/powerviolence with xKATExMOSHx from Italy and Fatal Nunchaku from France. Orange vinyl.
Fast, fast & faster.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F58908461&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: [DEADCHEM005] False Light - Self Titled 7"
description: Mind-crushing powerviolence/Hardcore from South Carolina Finally got these in and shipping NOW! For USA orders - http://headfirstrecords.limitedrun.com/ Originally released digitally only last year, we teamed up with Headfirst! Records to get this the physical release it deserved. Limited to 300 'murky water' coloured records in a foldout sleeve with screen printed obi strips. Listen/Download here-

name: [DEADCHEM004] Let It Die 'Self Titled' 7"
description: "Ketterings finest hardcore/punk/metal hybrids Let It Die follow-up last years demo with this, 6-tracks of blistering thrashy noise. Originally set to be released on Southern Lord records, until they decided they had over-commited themselves financially (no one can deny they put out a lot of stuff!), their loss becomes Church Of Fuck, Dead Chemists and Moshtache Records gain, as all 3 labels present you these awesome tracks on a run of 300 beautiful translucent purple 7" records, with radical art by Ben Foot. This band make an unholy racket, and their live show needs to be seen to be believed, without doubt one of the best heavy bands in the UK."

name: Headfirst! Records Distro: YAITW/Torch Runner, Moral Void, Gut Feeling, Discourse etc...
description: Get some awesome records from Headfirst! they're a little more expensive than our other records due to the cost of shipping them over but they work out at around half the price of ordering from the US Discourse EP Gut Feeling EP Low Sky EP Parasitic Skies / Losing Skin EP Young And In The Way/Moral Void 'split' (Grey /200, White/Black splatter /400) Young and in the Way / Torch Runner EP (2nd press white or maroon)

options.name: Young And In The Way/Moral Void 'grey'
Young And In The Way/Moral Void 'White/black splatter'
Young And In The Way/Torch Runner 'White'
Young And In The Way/Torch Runner 'maroon'

name: [DISTRO] Swinelord - Life Is Empty/I Feel Fucked 10"
description: In total synergy with the truly grim album art, Manchester, UK's Swinelord have created a vile, vicious and venomous 10 track beast. Ostensibly a filth ridden crust band (undoubtedly the best one you've never heard), 'Life Is Empty / I Feel Fucked' sees Swinelord's sound erupt with frenzied attacks of grindcore, soul crushing sludge and suffocating ,down tuned metallic hardcore all weaved in among the oppressive hatred. Coming off like the bastard son of The Afternoon Gentleman, Seven Sisters Of Sleep and Extreme Noise Terror, this record ushers in the summer bloom with an unmistakable stench of decay.

name: War Wolf/Sob Story 'split' cassette.
description: This is the split cassette from War Wolf and Sob Story (UK). It's the second release from both bands. This is the follow up to the Riding With Demons 10" from War Wolf and the follow up from the Sob Story Demo (this is also the only physical release from Sob Story). Comes on Green cassettes and can be downloaded from our bandcamp. 50 copies. 2 new tracks from each band, WW tracks on side A and SS tracks on side B. Every order comes with a patch of the artwork, size approx 4.5" x 5". FFO: Crop Circles, Harrowed. Covers printed by ACDSleeve. Black ink on card. Patches printed by Vinosangre. Black ink on white fabric. Artwork by Oliver Irongiant. (See 'Riding with Demons 10" in the distro to get both for cheaper)

name: [DISTRO] Esoteric Youth - The Burden Of Living 7"
description: The Burden of Living comes on black vinyl enclosed in a high quality 12-page booklet containing writings by Esoteric Youth, FFO: Young and In The Way, Oathbreaker, Rise and Fall, The Secret.

name: [DISTRO] Dopefight/Lex Rhino split 12"
description:
Sludgey doom VS. Doomy doom.
White 180g vinyl.
Heavier than fuck.

name: [DISTRO] Comity - The Journey Is Over Now 2xLP+CD
description: Comity redefine "epic" with The Journey Is Over Now -a chaotic composition of crushing riffs, progressive song structure, phenomenal drops and beautiful atmospherics seamlessly worked together to create a unique and captivating experience. Four tracks delivering 52 minutes of an oppressive but finely worked chaos : a maze of winding riffs and unique melodies. Essential if you listen to bands such as Converge, The Dillinger Escape Plan, Cave In etc. 2x12" Black Vinyl accompanied by a free CD of the record. Stylish package to say the least!

name: [DISTRO] Razoreater/Iced Out - Split 7"
[DISTRO] Hatred Surge - Deconstruct 12"
description:
Austin's own Hatred Surge deliver 17 tracks of grind influenced punk rock. Featuring members of Mammoth Grinder, Hatred Surge bring a unique male/female vocal sound and blast beats that put this LP over the top.

<iframe width="200" height="113" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/Bliof_WciBM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: [DISTRO] Triac/Disciples Of Christ - Split 12"
description:
Two of the best bands on the East Coast team up up for this killer release. Baltimoreâ€™s TRIAC blast through 5 tracks of furious blasting grindcore, after a bunch of 7"es and a 3 way Lp,here are some new blasts with a new singer features members of Hatewaves, Blower, Jesus of Nazareth....
Disciples of Christ features Members of Magrudergrind, Coke Bust, Sick Fix, and Juice Time do it noisier/filthier and a bit more power violence oriented, which sounds like something that would have come from the West Bay circa 1995. A mix of sludge, grind, and powerviolence. 

Triac -
<iframe width="200" height="150" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/kZarI4PizQ8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Disciples Of Christ -
<iframe width="200" height="150" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/izvtwDiDhI4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: [DISTRO] The Afternoon Gentlemen/Cyborg - Split 7"
description: Cyborg come blasting out of Chicago, IL with members of Weekend Nachos in tow, bringing pure American powerviolence in the vein of the classics Crossed Out and Spazz, while the UK's Afternoon Gentlemen put their own spin on the genre, drawing comparison to Despise You and Hellnation. The Afternoon Gentlemen - Cyborg-

name: [DISTRO] Chevin/Huffin' Paint - Split 7"
description: Pink and yellow vinyl Side A: 7 ridiculous harsh fastcore tunes by Chevin from Dresden, Ger Side B: 5 tracks of thrashcore nonsense by Huffin Paint from Nottingham, UK

name: [DISTRO] Drainland/Cellgraft split 7"
description: Drainland from Ireland once again return with their sludge crust Bovine noise hardcore thing. Two songs in their Drainland signature. Cellgraft from Florida on the other side with a mixture between Discordance Axis and a uhm vacuumcleaner. Over the top noisy grindcore. You should like this.

name: [DISTRO] Wake/Dephosphorus split 7"
description: "This 7" split between Depshosphorus and Wake, released by post-grind label 7 Degress Records (Keitzer, Gadget, Zodiac a.o.), is an abrupt display of excessive sonic violence. This assault lats just below 11 minutes total, and it is an equally chaotic and tight grind punch to the gut. Simply put, this music is mayhem put on wax."

name: [DISTRO] Grinding Halt/Suffering Quota split 7"
description: So hereâ€™s the much anticipated first vinyl output by Suffering Quota. Their last years demo already promised some great tunes for the future and they sure donâ€™t let us down on their side of this 7â€. A raw mix of Phobia and Assuck inspired grind with some crusty grooves and moshable breakdowns. Quality stuff with the only downside being itâ€™s only three songs leaving you hungry for more. Grinding Halt on their side start off with a hyperfast song in an almost Charles Bronson like way. The other song is a bit more midtempo with a Fingerprint feel to it. Buzzsaw guitars, rumbling bass, all over the place drumming and insane screaming, Well itâ€™s still Grinding Halt. Well done. Artwork by Steve Larder from Moloch fame.

name: [DISTRO] Grinding Halt/Diet Pills split 7"
description: Finaly some Grinding Halt vinyl again. Here showing some of the slower side of their set. Two songs of which one is somewhat of a noisy hc song while the 2nd has 90's mosh written all over it. On the flip side there's Diet Pills insanity. Hints of Dystopia and Jesus Lizard thrown in a blender. It's so heavy it makes you wonder how it would fit on the vinyl. Great dutch/uk team up!

name: [DISTRO] War Wolf - Riding with Demons 10" EP
description: Ex-Dopefight members playing nasty, doomy punk, punky doom, crusty doom punk or whatever else you want to call it. One of the best releases of '13 so far! Red Vinyl.
